segments.text: Yes , I would like to check in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my name is Carol Tiang . That's spelled J - I - A - N - G .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Ma'am . I can't find anything under that name.Do you have your confirmation number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't have it with me.But I know I have a reservation . My husband made it for me last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , let me look again . How do you spell your first name , Ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: C - A - R - O - L . Carol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't find a Carol in the computer for today . I have a Carol Larson here . But that reservation is for next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that's not me . My name is Tiang , not Larson . My husband reserved for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure he used your name , Ma'am ? Maybe he reserved under his name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His name is Lin , L - I - N .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I have nothing here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Miss , I know he made this reservation for me .
segments.speaker: S2
